content.author: Frank Lloyd Wright
content.quote: I'm all in favor of keeping dangerous weapons out of the hands of fools. Let's start with typewriters.

content.author: Ian L. Fleming
content.quote: I shall not waste my days in trying to prolong them.

content.author: H. G. Wells
content.quote: Human history becomes more and more a race between education and catastrophe.

content.author: John D. Rockefeller
content.quote: A friendship founded on business is better than a business founded on friendship.

content.author: Henry Ford
content.quote: Whether you think that you can, or that you can't, you are usually right.

content.author: Paul Erdos
content.quote: Problems worthy of attack prove their worth by fighting back.

content.author: Salvador Dali
content.quote: The only difference between me and a madman is that I'm not mad.

content.author: Thomas Alba Edison
content.quote: I have not failed. I've just found 10,000 ways that won't work.

content.author: Don Quixote 'Man of La Mancha'
content.quote: Facts are the enemy of truth.

content.author: Richard Dawkins
content.quote: We are all atheists about most of the gods humanity has ever believed in. Some of us just go one god further.
